nodes.name: POS System
nodes.cardText: React Native point of sale system made for iOS to be used with clothing resellers. Runway Fashion Exchange is currently working with us as our first user.

nodes.name: My Shop Analytics
nodes.cardText:
Front and backend machine shop order, part and operation tracker.
Currently being used daily by Alphaeus Manufacturing LLC

nodes.name: Dev Blog
nodes.cardText: This portfolio site began as my first Gatsby Static Blog. I started it on Github Pages and transitioned over to my own custom domain using Netlify.

nodes.name: Total Site Redesigns
nodes.cardText: I had multiple opportunities to implement new design to entire websites. Places like Q10 Capital, YesUtah, YesIdaho,  and Bonney. While I didn't come up with the designs, though I did have input and opportunities to modify, update, and change things as needed, I did implement them by myself for the entire sites.
